snippet.title: Kotodama - Character Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/997060/Kotodama_The_7_Mysteries_of_Fujisawa/

Pre-Order on Switch (EU) today!
https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch/Kotodama-The-7-Mysteries-of-Fujisawa-1544876.html

Kotodama: The 7 Mysteries of Fujisawa is an investigative visual novel where you must learn more about the Academy’s students before confronting them about their secrets. Battling the Students in Kotodama battles will allow you to literally strip away the lies and uncover the truth. Most of the students have their own skeletons in the closet – do you have what it takes to find the ultimate truth?

Coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Steam on 31st May in Europe and 4th June in North America.

http://pqube.co.uk/kotodama/

Come chat to us on our PQube Discord server! 
https://discord.gg/xHS7MnU

#Kotodama
